bibl.title: Continuity and Change in the Art of Late Roman and Early Christian Alexandria.
bibl.note: Communication présentée aux Troisièmes Journées d'études sur Alexandrie médiévale, Le Caire, 8-10 novembre 2002. - The paintings uncovered in 1960 in Hypogeum 3 of Wardian Necropolis as an example of continuation and change in the art of Late Roman and early Christian Alexandria.
RODZIEWICZ Mieczyslaw, Continuity and Change in the Art of Late Roman and Early Christian Alexandria.
Jean-Yves EMPEREUR et Christian DÉCOBERT (Édd.), Alexandrie médiévale 3 = Études alexandrines. 16 (Le Caire, 2008) pp. 229-245, 4 figg. n./bl., 4 figg. coul.
